ygData.subject: Re: Question /new to the list
ygData.msgSnippet: At lvl 15 I looked up a group in the Derv Camp in West Commons. The spawn rate is very fast in this camp (same in all derv camps?) that the heal song will make
ygData.messageBody:
At lvl 15 I looked up a group in the Derv Camp in West Commons. The spawn
rate is very fast in this camp (same in all derv camps?) that the heal song
will make them love you. Groups used to fight over me when I got there and
they wept when I left lol. You may need an almost full group to hold the
camp safely. The only problem is what do do with all the Derv Rings you get,
had 32 rings at one point so I started to give them away to newbies hehe.
Also lots of Wisps around for that extra cash :) To me this camp was both
good exp and loot.

/Woland Vildhufvud - lvl 21 jester of E'ci


>From: "Laura searle" <telania@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Question /new to the list

>
>From: "Laura searle" <telania@...>
>
>Hi. I stumbled upon this list and I'm so glad I found it. I wish I had
>known about it sooner.
>
>I am Telania, prior 15th lvl bard lady.::pouts:: I died shortly after
>hitting my new mark in HighPass.. (them dumb Orcs). I was thinking of
>heading to Unrest with my RL hubby who is a 14th lvl WE Warrior. But after
>reading about Unrest I dont' think we're ready. Sounds like we need to
>mature just a tad bit more.. =)
>
>
>ANYWAY, now that i've side tracked.. where is a good spot for my lvl to be?
> I've taken other suggestions like one,
>
>"go to kerra isle! Good loot and easy". uh, They like forgot to mention
>Trains. Died quiet harshly I might add. eh
>
>So, I will ask my brethen.. HELP?! hehe
>
>Any suggestions?
>
>Any and all would be appriecated.
>
>thank you
>
>Tel
>
>Innoruuk
